sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含有"奇怪的，奇异的，新奇的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: queer, odd, funny, crazy, curious, peculiar, strange, eccentric, quaint, singular
means: queer ： 指一种无法解释的怪诞，强调事物的奇特和不可思议。
odd ： 通常指不规律、偶尔出现的人或事物，往往令人困惑或奇怪。
funny ： 较通俗用词，指奇怪得滑稽可笑或反常。
crazy ： 多指与众不同的行为、外表或人与
物本身，含荒唐可笑或神经不正常的意味。
curious ： 通常指非常特别或能引起注意、研究或探索的奇特。
peculiar ： 侧重令人奇怪的或独一无二的特性，也指性格特征方面显著的与众不同之处。
strange ： 普通常用词，含义广泛，指陌生新奇、奇怪、奇怪或不自然的人或物。
eccentric ： 指偏离常规的怪异或怪癖。
quaint ： 指古色古香，会人感到既奇怪又有趣。
singular ： 通常指异常或奇特，暗含不同于一般。

sentence.Network_en: Cardinal Meschia was without doubt a singular character.
sentence.Network_cn: 红衣主教梅斯基亚无疑是个怪人。

sentence.Network_en: The singular of Inuit is Inuk.
sentence.Network_cn: Inuit（依努依特人）的单数形式是Inuk。

sentence.Network_en: The word "you" can be singular or plural.
sentence.Network_cn: 单词you可以是单数也可以是复数。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 名词有单数(singular)及复数(plural)。词性方面有阳性(masculine)，阴性(feminine)及中性(neuter)(在中文中极难分文字的性别)。
神秘的近义词 ... 诡异[ strange] 奇异[ strange;singular] 诡秘[ surreptitious;secretive].
英语单词立体记忆 ... a person of singular courage 极为勇敢的人 → singular 单数的，非凡的 slip 词根表“滑”.
英语单词立体记忆 ... a person of singular courage 极为勇敢的人 → singular 单数的，非凡的 slip 词根表“滑”.

list.abs: singular eigenfunction 奇异特征函数singular integral 奇异积分singular matrix 退化矩阵
singular matrix 退化阵singular operator 奇异算子singular ordinal 特异序数
英语词汇-数学词汇_专业词汇 ... singular 奇的 singular matrix 奇异矩阵; 不可逆矩阵 skew distribution 偏斜分布.
singular elliptic function 奇异椭圆函数singular function 奇异函数singular function of bounded variation 有界变差奇异函数.

means.word_mean: 不寻常的,无比的,空前的,突出的,稀有的
不常见的,稀奇的,古怪的,异常的

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'solitary, single', also 'beyond the average'): from Old French singuler, from Latin singularis, from singulus (see single)

encyclopedia.content: 泰国乐队：singular 【乐队】：泰国乐团 - Singular singular乐队是泰国索尼音乐娱乐公司旗下的一支乐队，由主唱兼词曲作者Sin和吉他手Nut组成。 Member introduction Sin（主唱/作词作曲） 姓名：Tosaporn Achawanuntagul昵称：Sin 生日：1985年10月1日 星座：天秤座 职业：歌手、词曲作者、平面设计师 教育：先皇技术学院 Nut（吉他） 姓名：Chotiwut Boonyasit 昵称：Nut 生日：1986年8月12日 星座：狮子座 职业：吉他手、教师

entry.def: The singular form of a word is the form that is used when referring to one person or thing.

example.ex: ...the fifteen case endings of the singular form of the Finnish noun...
example.tran: 芬兰语的名词单数形式的 15 种格尾

example.ex: The word 'you' can be singular or plural.
example.tran: 单词 you 可以是单数也可以是复数。

entry.def: The singular of a noun is the form of it that is used to refer to one person or thing.

example.ex: The singular of Inuit is Inuk.
example.tran: Inuit (依努依特人)的单数形式是 Inuk。

entry.def: Singular means very great and remarkable.

example.ex: Barre was quickly drawn into the electoral arena, although with singular lack of success.
example.tran: 尽管胜算微乎其微，巴雷还是很快被身不由己地推到了选举的舞台上。

entry.def: If you describe someone or something as singular, you mean that they are strange or unusual.

example.ex: Cardinal Meschia was without doubt a singular character...
example.tran: 红衣主教梅斯基亚无疑是个怪人。

example.ex: Where he got that singular notion I just can't think.
example.tran: 我真想不出来他从哪来的那种奇怪念头。

means.word_mean: 1. the form of a word that is used to denote a singleton

sentences.sentence: "such poise is singular in one so young"

means.word_mean: 2. beyond or deviating from the usual or expected;

sentences.sentence: "they have some funny ideas about war"

means.word_mean: 3. being a single and separate person or thing;

sentences.sentence: "can the singular person be understood apart from his culture?"
"every fact in the world might be singular...unlike any other fact and sole of its kind"-William James

means.word_mean: 4. grammatical number category referring to a single item or unit
5. the single one of its kind;

sentences.sentence: "the unique existing example of Donne's handwriting"
"a unique copy of an ancient manuscript"
"certain types of problems have unique solutions"

auth_sentence.content: In this there is a note of singular affirmation.
auth_sentence.res_content: In this there is a note of singular affirmation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In this there is a note of singular affirmation.

auth_sentence.content: The treatment of media as a singular noun...is spreading.
auth_sentence.res_content: The treatment of media as a singular noun...is spreading.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The treatment of media as a singular noun...is spreading.

auth_sentence.content: The observer and the observed is a singular process.
auth_sentence.res_content: The observer and the observed is a singular process.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The observer and the observed is a singular process.

sentences.en: The noun “mouse” is the singular form of “mice”.
“One box” is singular; “two boxes” is plural.

means.word_mean: 〈正〉突出的, 卓越的, 非凡的

sentences.en: The young man has a singular ear for music.
sentences.cn: 这个年轻人对音乐有非凡的欣赏力。

sentences.en: The noun is in the singular.

jushi.english: The noun “mouse” is the singular form of “mice”.
The young man has a singular ear for music.
jushi.chinese: 这个年轻人对音乐有非凡的欣赏力。

jushi.english: He is a man of singular courage and honesty.
jushi.chinese: 他是一个异常勇敢和诚实的人。
